sqlMap.select: SELECT lecture.no, lecture.subject, lecture.poster, lecture.teacher, lecture.lecturetime FROM sol_lecture lecture join sol_category category ON lecture.categoryno = category.categoryno WHERE category.grade = #grade# AND category.gwamok=#gwamok# ORDER BY lecture.no DESC
SELECT count(*) as cnt FROM sol_lecture lecture join sol_category category ON lecture.categoryno = category.categoryno WHERE category.grade = #grade# AND category.gwamok=#gwamok#
